prompts.identity_a: I am Melih Eren. A Software Engineering Student at Halic University.
prompts.career_goals: Short-term: Apply Flutter & AI skills in pro projects. Long-term: Become a Tech Lead in a global tech company.

experience: AI & Tech Academy (Scholar): Completed a 9-month Google-supported Data Science bootcamp. Developed ML models using Python.
Huawei Student Developers (HSD): As a Core Team Member, I played an active role in organizing community events and collaborated on technical projects with the team.
Payolog (USA - Remote): Developed mobile apps using Flutter in a global remote team.
Rubikpara: Built mobile payment interfaces using Flutter/Dart as a Fintech Intern.
Bilsoft Software: Designed ERP modules using C# and SQL.
projects: BioDietix (Graduation Project): Developed a system analyzing nutrition based on blood tests using Python & ML.
AI Chatbot: Built this interactive portfolio.
GitHub Portfolio: Created data analysis notebooks and Flutter UI kits.

ui.welcome_msg: Hello! I am Melih's AI assistant. Ask me about my certificates, projects, or skills.
